name: Burger Curse
description:
A great curse has fallen upon the land.

A Cursed burger to be exact.

It Turns people into burger zombies and you are the only one with the power to stop it.

You wield the power of curses and with the right runes you can stop this evil from ruling the world.

You have arrived at the source of evil and the only way to stop it is to lit all the sacred flames around the graveyard.

But beware of the great burger that is flying it will try to stop you and pull out any lights you lit on.

Good luck!

Controls 
WASD - To Move Around
Space - to Lit Candles 

1-4 To Activate your skills

Pick on of the curse powers and use it against your enemies
(Slow, Kill , Freeze , Defense)

Watch out for the curses that will cast upon you!
